metadata.title: USN-3746-1 -- APT vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that APT incorrectly handled the mirror method (mirror://). If a remote attacker were able to perform a machine-in-the-middle attack, this flaw could potentially be used to install altered packages in environments configured to use mirror:// entries.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3746-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  apt-doc - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1 apt-transport-https - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1 libapt-inst2.0 - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1 libapt-pkg-doc - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1 apt - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1 apt-utils - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1 libapt-pkg5.0 - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1 libapt-pkg-dev - 1.6.3ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
